title: T206 Chance Yellow Lenox back SGC 40
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 Chance Yellow Lenox back SGC 40
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD!

Hello all,
I know I just bought this one, but didn't really plan on needing to pay for a Hindu Matty the next day.  Buy it at $$$OLD, or we can work a cash and trade for the following cards in VG-VGEX condition to finish off my backs line.  I need the following:
Targets:
AB 460 - Frank Baker or Jennings
Cycle 350 - Eddie Collins (that's all you David)
AB 350 No Frame - Hughie Jennings, Frank Baker, Eddie Collins
SC 350-460 Fact. 25- Addie Joss
Piedmont 150- 3 Finger Brown
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/?action=view&current=T206ChanceLenoxFront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206ChanceLenoxFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/?action=view&current=T206ChanceLenoxBack.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206ChanceLenoxBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Hi Bob,

I'll take it. Please send details for payment.

Thanks.

Hank
[url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks for looking, card is going to Hank.
Take care,
Bob
